## AnalyzableNode.path property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Unique identifier within the module. Uses dot notation for nesting (e.g., "User", "User.id", "MyNamespace.MyClass.method")

**Signature:**

```typescript
path: string;
```
